  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0031114</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Tejido muscular</string>
            <string language="en">Muscle tissue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Muskelgewebe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tissu de muscle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tecido do músculo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tessuto del muscolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστός μυών</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica la estructura interna del tejido muscular estriado y, en concreto, el sarcómero. Aporta para ello una animación sobre la contracción de sarcómero.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the internal structure of striated muscle tissue and, in detail, the sarcomere. It presents an animation on the contraction of the sarcomere.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Tejido muscular</string>
            <string language="en">Muscle tissue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die interne Struktur des 
gestreiften Muskelgewebes und im Detail des Sarkomers erklärt. 
Er stellt eine Animation auf der Kontraktion des Sarkomers dar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant la structure interne du tissu 
strié de muscle et, en détail, du sarcomère. Il présente une
animation sur la contraction du sarcomère.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica a estrutura interna de tecido 
striated do músculo e, em detalhe, do sarcomere. Apresenta um 
animation na contração do sarcomere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega la struttura interna del 
tessuto striato del muscolo e, dettagliatamente, del sarcomero. 
Presenta una animazione sulla contrazione del sarcomero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί την εσωτερική δομή του striated 
ιστού μυών και, λεπτομερώς, sarcomere. Παρουσιάζει μια 
ζωτικότητα στη συστολή sarcomere.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Muskelgewebe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tissu de muscle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
